testsuite.name: Add Criterion

testcase.name: Register a criterion that does not exist
Register a criterion that already exists
Error when registering a criterion that already exists

testsuite.system-out:
#Esta feature Ã© a feature inicial, idealizada antes da iteraÃ§Ã£o de imlementar features. #Portanto, serÃ¡ descartada dos testes finais visto que nÃ£o faz uso de mÃ©todos de controlador que nÃ£o sejam #Gerados automaticamente. #Arthur Lapprand Feature: Add Criterion As the teacher I want to be able to register new criteria So I can evaluate the students with these criteria
--Output from Register a criterion that does not exist-- --Output from Register a criterion that already exists-- #Controller Scenario Scenario: Register a criterion that does not exist # AddCriterion.feature:12 Given the criterion with name "P1" is not on the system # AddCriterionSteps.groovy:38 When I create the criterion "P1" # AddCriterionSteps.groovy:43 Then the criterion "P1" is properly added to the system # AddCriterionSteps.groovy:48
--Output from Error when registering a criterion that already exists-- #Controller Scenario Scenario: Register a criterion that already exists # AddCriterion.feature:18 Given the criterion named "P2" already exists on the system # AddCriterionSteps.groovy:59 When I create the criterion with description "P2" # AddCriterionSteps.groovy:66 Then the system does nothing # AddCriterionSteps.groovy:70
#GUI Scenario Scenario: Error when registering a criterion that already exists # AddCriterion.feature:24 Given the criterion "P3" already exists # AddCriterionSteps.groovy:82 And I am on the Add Criterion page # AddCriterionSteps.groovy:90 When I add the criterion "P3" # AddCriterionSteps.groovy:95 Then I should see a message related to the criterion registration failure # AddCriterionSteps.groovy:101
testsuite.system-err: --Output from Register a criterion that does not exist-- --Output from Register a criterion that already exists-- --Output from Error when registering a criterion that already exists--

testsuite.name: Add Group Criterion

testcase.name: Register a group of criteria that does not exist
Register a non-existent group of criteria
Register a group of criteria that some of them already exists
Register a group of criteria that some elements of it already exists

testsuite.system-out:
#Thiago Bastos Feature: Add Group Criterion As the teacher I want to be able to register new criteria So I can evaluate the students with these criteria
--Output from Register a group of criteria that does not exist-- --Output from Register a non-existent group of criteria-- #Controller Scenario Scenario: Register a group of criteria that does not exist # AddGroupOfCriteria.feature:8 Given the criterion "C1" is not on the system # AddGroupOfCriteriaSteps.groovy:35 And the criterion with name "C2" is also not on the system # AddGroupOfCriteriaSteps.groovy:42 When I create the group of criteria "C1;C2" # AddGroupOfCriteriaSteps.groovy:49 Then the criterion "C1" is added to the system # AddGroupOfCriteriaSteps.groovy:56 And the criterion "C2" is also properly added to the system # AddGroupOfCriteriaSteps.groovy:61
--Output from Register a group of criteria that some of them already exists-- #GUI Scenario Scenario: Register a non-existent group of criteria # AddGroupOfCriteria.feature:16 Given I can not see the criterion "C3" # AddGroupOfCriteriaSteps.groovy:76 And I can not see the criterion "C4" # AddGroupOfCriteriaSteps.groovy:76 And I am at the Add Group of Criteria page # AddGroupOfCriteriaSteps.groovy:84 When I fill the field Nome with the name "C3;C4" # AddGroupOfCriteriaSteps.groovy:89 And I finalize the criteria registration # AddGroupOfCriteriaSteps.groovy:94 Then I should see the "C3" criterion available on the criteria list # AddGroupOfCriteriaSteps.groovy:100 And I should see the "C4" criterion available on the criteria list # AddGroupOfCriteriaSteps.groovy:100
--Output from Register a group of criteria that some elements of it already exists-- #Controller Scenario Scenario: Register a group of criteria that some of them already exists # AddGroupOfCriteria.feature:26 Given the criterion with name "C5" isnt on the system # AddGroupOfCriteriaSteps.groovy:119 And the criterion with name "C9" is on the system # AddGroupOfCriteriaSteps.groovy:125 When I register the group of criteria "C5;C9" # AddGroupOfCriteriaSteps.groovy:133 Then the criterion "C5" is in the system # AddGroupOfCriteriaSteps.groovy:139 And the criterion "C9" is not added to the system # AddGroupOfCriteriaSteps.groovy:143
#GUI Scenario Scenario: Register a group of criteria that some elements of it already exists # AddGroupOfCriteria.feature:34 Given I can not see the criterion "C6" # AddGroupOfCriteriaSteps.groovy:76 And I can see the criterion "C7" # AddGroupOfCriteriaSteps.groovy:159 And I am at the Add Group of Criteria page # AddGroupOfCriteriaSteps.groovy:84 When I fill the field Nome with the name "C6;C7" # AddGroupOfCriteriaSteps.groovy:89 And I finalize the criteria registration # AddGroupOfCriteriaSteps.groovy:94 Then I should see the "C6" criterion available on the criteria list # AddGroupOfCriteriaSteps.groovy:100 And I should see the "C7" criterion only one time available on the criteria list # AddGroupOfCriteriaSteps.groovy:173
testsuite.system-err: --Output from Register a group of criteria that does not exist-- --Output from Register a non-existent group of criteria-- --Output from Register a group of criteria that some of them already exists-- --Output from Register a group of criteria that some elements of it already exists--

testsuite.name: AddEvaluation

testcase.name: Add evaluation more than once with same origin

testsuite.system-out:
Feature: AddEvaluation As a teacher I want to evaluate each student by criteria to show them their progress in class
--Output from Add evaluation to a criteria-- --Output from Add evaluations using incomplete data-- Scenario: Add evaluation to a criteria # AddEvaluation.feature:6 Given there are no evaluations to all students to the "X" criterion, originated from a "Test" and dated from "28/03/2016" # AddEvaluation.groovy:95 When I want to evaluate all students to the "X" criterion, originated from a "Test" and dated from "28/03/2016". # AddEvaluation.groovy:103 Then all the evaluations will be stored in on the "X" criterion history of each student # AddEvaluation.groovy:112
--Output from Add evaluation more than once with same origin-- Scenario: Add evaluations using incomplete data # AddEvaluation.feature:11 Given there are no evaluations to all students to the "Y" criterion, # AddEvaluation.groovy:117 When I want to evaluate all students to a the "Y" criteria, without a specific origin and dated from "28/03/2016". # AddEvaluation.groovy:125 Then all evaluations will not be stored in on the "Y" criterion history of each student # AddEvaluation.groovy:130
Scenario: Add evaluation more than once with same origin # AddEvaluation.feature:16 Given evaluations for every student on the "X" criteria, originated from "Test" and dated from "28/03/2016" are already in the system # AddEvaluation.groovy:134 When I want to add a mark to all students to a the "X" criteria, originated from "Test" and dated from "28/03/2016" # AddEvaluation.groovy:142 Then all the marks will not be stored in on the "X" criteria's history of each student # AddEvaluation.groovy:148
testsuite.system-err: --Output from Add evaluation to a criteria-- --Output from Add evaluations using incomplete data-- --Output from Add evaluation more than once with same origin--

testsuite.name: Notification

testcase.name: Show the students list in the "70% of evaluations are over the class average" report
testcase.failure:
Assertion failed:
title ==~/Report List/ | | | false Show Report

testsuite.system-out:
Feature: Notification As an administrator I want to be notified about the students issues without searching for their historic So I can know who has its performance under the class evaluations average quickly
--Output from Update a report-- --Output from Show the students list in the "70% of evaluations are over the class average" report-- ##GUI # Scenario: Be notified about the students's performance issues # Given I am at the home page # When I go to the Reports page # Then the item "Reports" on the menu will show if there are new notifications # # ##GUI # Scenario: Notify new report type # Given that the report with name "70% of evaluations are MPA", evaluation "MPA", type "Porcentagem", value "0.7" is in the system # And I am in the Evaluation page # When I add the evaluation "MPA" to the student "Joan", login "jsd" # Then 70% of his evaluations are composed of "MPA" # And I should see a new notification related to the new report type # #Controller Scenario: Update a report # Notificacao.feature:22 Given that report with name "70% of evaluations are MANA", evaluation "MANA", type "Porcentagem", value "0.7" is in the system # StepDefReport.groovy:21 When I add the evaluation "MANA" in the criterion "blah blah" with origin "Mini-Test" and date "26/04/2016" to the student with name "Saulo Henrique Dias" and the login "shd2" # StepDefReport.groovy:29 Then 70% of the student "shd2" evaluations are composed of "MANA" # StepDefReport.groovy:37 And the report "70% of evaluations are MANA" is updated adding the student with login "shd2" # StepDefReport.groovy:42
#GUI Scenario: Show the students list in the "70% of evaluations are over the class average" report # Notificacao.feature:29 Given I am in the Report page # StepDefReport.groovy:53 And I try to create the report named "70% of evaluations are over the class average", type "Media", value "0", evaluation "MA" # StepDefReport.groovy:57 When I select the "70% of evaluations are over the class average" report # StepDefReport.groovy:69 Then I should see the details related to the "70% of evaluations are over the class average" report # StepDefReport.groovy:73 Assertion failed:
title ==~/Report List/ | | | false Show Report
at pages.ReportsPages.ShowReportsPage$__clinit__closure1.doCall(ShowReportsPage.groovy:11) at pages.ReportsPages.ShowReportsPage$__clinit__closure1.doCall(ShowReportsPage.groovy) at geb.Page.verifyThisPageAtOnly(Page.groovy:228) at geb.Page.verifyAt(Page.groovy:182) at geb.Page$verifyAt$4.call(Unknown Source) at geb.Page$verifyAt$4.call(Unknown Source) at geb.Browser.doAt(Browser.groovy:454) at geb.Browser.at(Browser.groovy:336) at geb.binding.BindingUpdater$InvocationForwarding.doCall(BindingUpdater.groovy:73) at steps.StepDefReport$_run_closure8.doCall(StepDefReport.groovy:74) at âœ½.Then I should see the details related to the "70% of evaluations are over the class average" report(Notificacao.feature:33)

testsuite.name: Remove Criterion

testcase.name: Remove a criterion with students and evaluations using it
Remove a criterion from the system

testsuite.system-out:
#Arthur Lapprand Feature: Remove Criterion As the teacher I want to remove a Criterion from the system So that Criterion is not affecting student average anymore
--Output from Remove a criterion with students and evaluations using it-- --Output from Remove a criterion from the system-- #GUI Scenario Scenario: Remove a criterion with students and evaluations using it # RemoveCriterion.feature:9 Given a student with name "Zeca" and login "zc" is already on the system # RemoveCriterionSteps.groovy:25 And this student has an evaluation in criterion "TEORICA" # RemoveCriterionSteps.groovy:33 When I remove the criterion "TEORICA" # RemoveCriterionSteps.groovy:45 Then I should not see the criterion "TEORICA" listed in the student with login "zc" # RemoveCriterionSteps.groovy:54
#Controller Scenario Scenario: Remove a criterion from the system # RemoveCriterion.feature:16 Given the system has a student with name "Jose" and login "jj" # RemoveCriterionSteps.groovy:67 And that student has a "MA" evaluation in criterion "GDI" with origin "Test" and applicationDate "21/12/1992" # RemoveCriterionSteps.groovy:74 When I remove the criterion "GDI" from the student "Jose" with login "jj" # RemoveCriterionSteps.groovy:81 Then the system correctly removes the criterion # RemoveCriterionSteps.groovy:88
testsuite.system-err: --Output from Remove a criterion with students and evaluations using it-- --Output from Remove a criterion from the system--
